summary: Comprehensive testing of VasilisNetShield enhancements completed successfully. All backend APIs functional with new question types, Module Designer interface working with proper CRUD operations, SimulationBuilder improvements verified, and phishing campaigns with training module assignment tested successfully. Authentication working with provided super_admin credentials.
passed_tests: Backend health check (/api/health) returns healthy status with database connection
Admin login with testadmin@test.com / TestPass123! working (super_admin role)
Training modules API (/api/training/modules) lists existing modules successfully
Created new training module with rich question types (multiple_choice, true_false, safe_unsafe)
Module supports questions array field with proper structure and validation
Phishing campaigns API (/api/phishing/campaigns) accessible and functional
Created phishing campaign with assigned_module_id field successfully
Phishing templates API working for SimulationBuilder integration
Module Designer UI (/question-modules) shows modules list with Edit/Delete buttons
New Module button present and functional in Module Designer interface
Simulation Builder (/simulation-builder) loads with type selection interface
Simulation Builder shows Phishing Email type and various security simulation options
Frontend authentication flow working with provided credentials
All pages load without JavaScript errors or crashes
Navigation between different admin features working smoothly

module_designer_features: List existing training modules with Edit/Delete buttons - ✅ Working
New Module creation button present - ✅ Working
Display modules with rich question types support - ✅ Working
Integration with backend training modules API - ✅ Working
simulation_builder_features: Type selection interface for different simulation types - ✅ Working
Templates and Saved tabs present - ✅ Working
backend_api_features: Training modules with questions array field - ✅ Working
Rich question types (multiple_choice, true_false, safe_unsafe, select_best, image_question) - ✅ Working
Phishing campaigns with assigned_module_id field - ✅ Working
authentication_and_routing: Admin login with testadmin@test.com credentials - ✅ Working
Module Builder redirect to question-modules - ✅ Working
